SCHEDULE

The person discharging managerial responsibilities ("PDMR") in respect of whom this notification is made is Amish Sabharwal, EVP Engineering Business Unit.

On 27 August 2021, AVEVA Group plc (the "Company") was informed of the exercise of options to acquire ordinary shares of 3 5 / 9 pence each ("Shares") (having met performance criteria and conditions) in the Company in favour of the above-named PDMR under the terms of the AVEVA Group Long Term Incentive Plan 2014 and the AVEVA Senior Employee Group Restricted Share Plan 2015. On the same day, the PDMR sold the resulting Shares.
